name: Sundering Strike (Excalibur's Wrath)
description: 35 Energy: King Arthur winds up a massive jab, charging forward slightly before striking. Enemies hit by this jab are stunned for 1s. 80 Energy: King Arthur charges forward with Excalibur drawn. If King Arthur hits an enemy god, he launches them into the air and unleashes a barrage of 6 attacks, after which he launches them back to the ground dealing damage to the target and any enemy below.
stats: Jab Damage: 100/160/220/280/340 (+65% of your physical power)
Damage per Hit: 10/25/40/55/70 (+10% of your physical power)
Max HP Damage: 2% Physical Damage Per Hit
Landing Damage: 50/110/170/230/290 (+50% of your physical power)
Max HP Damage: 5/7/9/11/13% Physical Damage Landing Hit
